page.title: 11Uley 50 years ago
page.content: About 50 years ago Uley was a quiet viilage surrounded by woods and fields.Many people earned their living by working on the land. There were several shops;three of them were Butchers,one was a Bakers and there was a Post Office,Garage Sweet Shop and a Hairdressers.Bread was baked and delivered daily by horse and cart.Milk was also delivered from a farm.Customers had their jugs filled from milk churns.Villagers had to collect their own water too.There were water pumps all down The Street enclosed in cupboards opened with keys.Candles and oil lamps were used because there wasn't any gas or electricity.There was an open drain down The Street and no sewer in the village.For entertainment the big event each year was the fair held on The Green on the first Sunday in
